definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
road or pavement laid with flagstones

sentences.english: The roof is slate to match the surrounding buildings.
sentences.chinese: 屋顶用石板瓦盖以适应周围的建筑。

sentences.english: Comparison of Indoor thermal Envionment by the Different Construction of Stone-slab Houses …
sentences.chinese: 不同类型石板屋工法对于室内温热环境之比较。

sentences.english: We are paving our garden path with slabs of stone.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在用石板铺我们的花园小径。

sentences.english: The paths of bluestone slates zigzag through the woods.
sentences.chinese: 自然曲折的青石板小路环绕林间。

sentences.english: The stone was pecked and ground into square flags.
sentences.chinese: 石头被凿开并磨成方石板。

sentences.english: To do a good job in artificial quartz plate, the following four points is the key.
sentences.chinese: 要想做好人造石英石板材，以下四点是关键。

sentences.english: The granite pavement of the courtyard is wet because it rained last night.
sentences.chinese: 天井里的青石板是湿漉漉的，因为昨晚下了一阵雨。

sentences.english: Church, in the dark hold of mosaic stone, stone carvings of flowers on the figures.
sentences.chinese: 牌坊柱下镶嵌抱鼓石，石板上有人物花卉雕刻。

sentences.english: These are the minimum number of steps when laying flagstone by dry construction.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是最低人数时铺设石板干施工步骤。

sentences.english: You can't get specific because the flagstone will act as a jig saw puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 因为你不能得到具体石板将作为夹具看到谜。

sentences.english: After that, use water-mill machine to polish the edges and angles of the slate material.
sentences.chinese: 之后，用水磨机对石板的边角进行抛光。

sentences.english: Will the quartz stone be used for a long time?
sentences.chinese: 石英石板材长时间使用会变旧吗？

sentences.english: The tablets were understood from legend to give the bearer authority from Thoth.
sentences.chinese: 在传说中，石板的携带者被视为拥有透特的权威。

sentences.english: Shovel the snow away from the garden path.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在用石板铺我们的花园小径。

sentences.english: An exposed concrete body with flagged surface forms the center of the house.
sentences.chinese: 一个暴露的带有铺石板的混凝土躯干是住宅的中心。

definition: road or pavement laid with flagstones
crushed or broken rock, stone etc
